resources.string: Please update your Z-Way. version 2.3.0 is required!
Please check the correctness of your data.
Permission to use the camera is required!
Please scan the QR code you find on your device or in the user setup of your web interface.
Access via Wifi of the Hub
More than one hub found. Please select the one you want to configure.
Please select a IP address first.
No local Hub found. Please try again or skip this step.
A Hub with this title or remote id already exists!
Connection to Hub failed! Please check the correctness of your data.
Authentication failed! Please check the correctness of your data.
Loading of current profile failed! Please check the correctness of your data.
Loading of device data failed! Please check the correctness of your data.
Device history of the last 24 hours successfully loaded.
Loading of device history of the last 24 hours failed! Please check the correctness of your data.
Loading of icons failed! Please check the correctness of your data.
Loading of location data failed! Please check the correctness of your data.
Notifications of the last 12 hours successfully loaded.
Loading of notifications of the last 12 hours failed! Please check the correctness of your data.
Loading of profile data failed! Please check the correctness of your data.
Setting up the Mobile App Support in Z-Way needed for the notifications.
Setting up the Mobile App Support in Z-Way failed!
All actions have been successfully completed. The App is now ready for use.
Check access via WiFi of the Hub.
Access via Wifi of the Hub successfully established.
Skip access via WiFi of the Hub.
Access via remote service successfully established.
Connection via local access successfully established.
Connection to Hub has failed with all variants.
Connection to Hub successfully established at least with one variant.
Setting up the Mobile App Support in Z-Way needed for the notifications.
Sending the register command to the App resulted in an internal Z-Way error.
Unexpected error occurred during register App in Z-Way: %1$s.
Clear all notification data. Are you sure?
An unexpected error occurred! Please try again.
Please install and add Mobile App Support in Z-Way.
Please check the correctness of your data.
Hub is not connected. The data has not been updated.
Configuration not complete or not valid!
Successfully logged on to the system.

Z-Way App Version 1.3 (16.05.2017)

Copyright © 2017 Z-Wave.Me

Z-Way App is build using open source software:

"

Version 1.4

Display the history when tap on a multilevel sensor widget. If no data available, the notification view is displayed.

Display the notification view when tap on a binary and discrete sensor widget.

"
Title and image displayed in Z-Way, when the mobile phone is in a geofencing area of a home.
Please enter a phone title first!
Not all Hub\'s have a location configured! The location settings can be found in the Hub settings.
Press long to select a location.

"

Z-Way App is build using open source software:

Apache License, Version 2.0

  • MaterialDrawer (Github)
  • QRCodeReaderView (Github)
  • Picasso (Github)
  • Apache Commons Net
  • Apache Commons Lang
  • Android-Iconics (Github)
  • Iconify (Github)
  • Chroma (Github)
  • MPAndroidChart (Github)
  • Otto (Github)
  • Android PagerSlidingTabStrip (Github)
  • Google GSON (Github)
  • Android Support Library
  • Android Vision API
  • Android Location API
  • Android Maps API

Eclipse Public License v1.0

  • Z-Way library for Java (Github)

MIT

  • Fancybuttons (Github)
  • TextDrawable (Github)
  • Material Dialogs (Github)
  • SLF4J Simple Binding
